update flow_todo t
biaoti = #{biaoti},
neirong = #{neirong},
biztype = #{biztype},
status = #{status},
memo = #{memo},
todoIds = #{todoIds},
updateTime = now()
where t.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from v_flow_todo t where t.bizid = #{bizid} and t.flowid = #{flowid} and status = 1 order by t.updateTime

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.updateTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') updateTime, u.username, u.nickname, p.deptname FROM (SELECT * FROM flow_todo t WHERE t.bizid = #{buyId} AND t.url = #{actionUrl} and t.memo = 2 and t.status = 1 GROUP BY t.auditby ORDER BY t.createTime) t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = t.auditby LEFT JOIN t_dept p ON p.id = u.deptid

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.updateTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') updateTime, u.username, u.nickname, p.deptname FROM (SELECT f.id,f.auditby,f.updateTime FROM flow_todo_item t LEFT JOIN flow_todo f ON t.flow_todo_id = f.id WHERE f.id in ( ${strTodoIds} ) AND t.flow_item_id in ( ${strFlowItemIds} ) ORDER BY f.createTime) t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = t.auditby LEFT JOIN t_dept p ON u.deptid = p.id

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.updateTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') updateTime, u.nickname, u.username, p.deptname FROM flow_todo t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON t.auditby = u.id LEFT JOIN t_dept p ON u.deptid = p.id WHERE t.bizid = #{bizid} and t.memo = #{memo} AND t.url = #{actionUrl} AND t.status = 1

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.updateTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') updateTime, u.nickname, u.username, p.deptname FROM flow_todo t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON t.auditby = u.id LEFT JOIN t_dept p ON u.deptid = p.id WHERE t.id = #{todoId}
SELECT * FROM flow_todo WHERE auditby = #{userId} and status = 0 order by createTime desc
SELECT t.*, u.username,u.nickname FROM flow_todo t left join sys_user u on t.bizcreateby = u.id WHERE t.auditby = #{userId} and t.status = 0 order by createTime desc
